title: Understanding Our Soil: The Nitrogen Cycle Fixers and Fertilizer

tasks.task: Understanding nitrogen-fixing plants' role in agriculture
subtasks: Identifying the significance of nitrogen in plant growth and functions (photosynthesis, protein production)
Exploring the nitrogen cycle and the process of nitrogen fixation by bacteria
Recognizing the benefits of interplanting nitrogen-fixing species with heavy-nitrogen-demanding crops
Considering the impact of traditional nitrogen fertilizers on soil ecosystems and emissions
Analyzing the importance of maintaining soil health for sustainable agriculture and nutrient retention
Reflecting on the interdependence of plants, microorganisms, and fungi in nutrient cycling
